name: Mediterranean Lentil Salad With Lemon-Thyme Vinaigrette
recipeCategory: dinner, easy, lunch, salads and dressings
keywords: lemon, lentils, thyme, nut-free, vegetarian, side dish, spring, summer
recipeIngredient: 1/2 cup oil-cured black olives, pitted and coarsely chopped
2 stalks celery, trimmed, peeled and thinly sliced
Salt and freshly ground pepper to taste
1 tablespoon chopped fresh parsley, for garnish
2 large cloves garlic, peeled and minced

recipeInstructions.text: To make the salad, combine the lentils and water in a large saucepan and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until tender but not mushy, about 20 minutes. Drain, place in a large bowl and let cool. Toss the tomato, olives, feta and celery with the lentils.

To make the vinaigrette, whisk together the lemon juice, garlic and thyme in a medium bowl. Slowly whisk in the olive oil. Whisk in the salt and pepper. Toss the vinaigrette with the salad and season to taste. Divide among 4 plates, garnish with chopped parsley and serve.
